EmailTemplate.name: Thank you for choosing Astrum Solar (1416940116.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for choosing Astrum Solar (1416940116.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US ZH-TW AR-SA Maureen & Henry- I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for choosing Astrum Solar for your home solar installation. We know solar is a very competitive business and that you have many choices for an installer, so we are honored that you selected us. We are excited to welcome you as our newest customers in Wellesley. Kevin will take good care of you as the process unfolds, but if I can be of any assistance to you, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thanks again, and have a great rest of the week. Best regards,Jose <http://www.astrumsolar.com/> Jose RamosChief Marketing OfficerP 707.495.8049 <tel:707.495.8049>F 855.850.3351 <tel:855.850.3351>E jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com <mailto:jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com>6200 Stoneridge Mall Road, Suite 300Pleasanton, CA 94588www.astrumsolar.com <http://www.astrumsolar.com/>
